_sText:
<object width="873" height="525"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube-nocookie.com/v/s0U01rMc2pI&hl=en&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b&hd=1&border=1"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube-nocookie.com/v/s0U01rMc2pI&hl=en&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x5d1719&color2=0xcd311b&hd=1&border=1" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="873" height="525"></embed></object>

After the successful release of dr_horrorhouse 
and then the constant releases of patches and fixes
"Dr_horrorhousebeta" "dr_horrorhouseremix" "Dr_horrorhousefinal" "dr_horrorhousecompleted"

But Finally horrorhouse was done and i was desperate to start a new deathrunmap

i looked back at horrorhouse and thought how could i make another horror
map that beats horrorhouse in everyway.

Being the horror fan i am i got straight to work.. and have been working 
on the map for months.

Of Course this is still BETA 
Sadly no ones been around to test it..
But I've Been so desperate to get it out to the public i thought i'd release this beta

**************************************************************
Now Please When you comment i want you to notify me of any

Glitches 
Exploits
Sever Crashes
Intense lagging
Ideas For more stuff
Graphical Errors
**************************************************************

And i bet there will be glitches.. But i'm hoping they are far and few.

So Of Course your asking... what the heck is in dr_hauntedmansion anyways?

Well

Traps include
Trap 1: Spirit Controller : You Take Controll of spirits that you navigate around with arrowkeys and try to hit players to teleport them to a haunted clock mountain which kills them!
Trap 2: Haunted Axe 1: Haunted Axe Flings down and players have to make sure they dont get hit!
Trap 3: Haunted Axe 2: Haunted Axe Flings down and players have to make sure they dont get hit!
Trap 4: Haunted Axe 3: Haunted Axe Flings down and players have to make sure they dont get hit!
Trap 5: Spooky Books 1: Books Fly out of there shelves and can kill players on touch
Trap 6: Spooky Books 2: Books Fly out of there shelves and can kill players on touch
Trap 7: Spooky Books 3: Books Fly out of there shelves and can kill players on touch
Trap 8: Disapearing Staircase: Scary Staircase moves players up.. but can dissapear and teleport players to a hauntlingly freaky death!
Trap 9: Zombie Shooter: Take Controll of the evil spirits once again to shoot zombie heads at cts
Trap 10: Lightning Strike: Hit Players With THE ALMIGHTY POWER OF LIGHTNING!!
Trap 11: Spinning Rocks Of Doom: Spinning rock knocks players off into aids infested water!
Trap 12: Piano Key 1: Piano Key shoots up To kill CTS
Trap 13: Piano Key 2: Piano Key shoots up To kill CTS
Trap 14: Piano Key 3: Piano Key shoots up To kill CTS
Trap 15: Piano Key 4: Piano Key shoots up To kill CTS
Trap 16: Electricity + Water: This is a more complex trap and very original.. there are 2 lines of electricity.. when the button is pressed eletric spark goes down and players have to jump when it touches the water or they get ZAPPED
Trap 17: Freaky Fireplace: When going through the fireplace press the button and the fireplace will close up behind them and they will be burned alive!!
Trap 18: Chandeler: Chandeler falls down breaking table
Trap 19: Haunted Sword 1: Haunted Swords Come Down on players from suits of armor...are they alive?
Trap 20: Haunted Sword 2: Haunted Swords Come Down on players from suits of armor...are they alive?
Trap 21: Haunted Sword 3: Haunted Swords Come Down on players from suits of armor...are they alive?
Trap 22: CRAZY BLACK GUY : Crazy black guy pops up from the abyse to kill and frighten players!
Trap 23: Zombie Head Appears And The Black part pushes you into him! very freaky!

Stages of map:
Stage 1: Cemetary
Stage 2: Haunted Mansion
Stage 3: Spooky Graveyard
Stage 4: The Part Of The house they dont want you to go..
Stage 5: Cave
Stage 6: Piano
Stage 7: The Soul Of The Demons
Stage 8: Are We back at the house?
Stage 9: Things Are getting messed up!
Stage 10: Abstract At It's Highest

Random Events:
Event 1: Evil Girl flys out at you
Event 2: Monster Clown Appears
Event 3: Ghost Train Passes By
Event 4: The room turns to blood!!
Event 5: Choose your fate as a 1/2 random trap decides whether you live..or DIE
Event 6: What was that?! A zombie flys by you
Event 7: Messed Up Creature Fly's Past Your face
Event 8: MASSIVE ZOMBIE APPEARS

Suprises:
i wont say but let's just say theres over 4 suprises in this map for you ;)

Secrets:
OVER 5 HIDDEN SECRETS

Ending MiniGames:
Climbing: skill jumping to get to the top where there is guns
Knife: Knife fight
AWP: use awps in a little map that looks really nice 
Grenade And knife fight.. IN SPACE: Chuck grenades and try to knife your opponent.. in space!!
Bow And Arrows: Shoot Other Team With Bows And Arrows
Scout Aim : or run to the middle and get a shotgun but you could risk getting scouted by the other.
Knife fight in space: knife fight in space.. with grenades :D
*NEW* RUN T RUN: T's run to guns while ct's try to scout them
*NEW* Classic: Play the classic ending of deathrun.. get guns and find the t's and kill them!

IMPORTANT: FOR THIS MAP TO WORK TYPE THIS IN CONSOLE OR IN YOUR SEVER.CFG!! net_maxfilesize 70

DON'T FORGET TO BZ2 IT XD

*********************************
REMIX UPDATES:
more doors to make place appear bigger
more optimisation for slighty less lagg and smaller size
fixed some messy brushes
afk killer hurt lowered
fixed glitch how trap 9 could activate last trap
fixed broken random event
house spawn changed to look bigger
secret added
added more chandelers
fixed loads of graphical errors
added new area
added new minigame "RUN T'S RUN"
fixed minigame crashing
fixed teleport to piano crashing
fixed crashing on trap 9
fixed any crashing reported
more decals added.. leaves,vines,moss
added cool ending spot lights
*********************************
REMIX 2 UPDATES:
fixed graphical errors
made in your face secret soo much more freakier
fixed up end lights
deleted random bright light in bows and arrows room
*********************************
REMIX 3 UPDATES:
now over 64 slot
changed bow and arrow room so now its easier to hit opponant
put in 3d skybox
added rayman sound at the end
more nodraws done
fixed more graphical issues
lowers dust partical ammount
put delay on intro words
made some of the nades in the space room not move..
got rid of big block breaking at the start
electricity room changed to make it longer for player to walk
new secret
fixed it that you can see the minigames at the start
made house outside look bigger.
*********************************
REMIX 4 UPDATES:
rain outside
added rain sound
completly changed spawn to give it that real spooky mansion feel. 
the intro is suppost to show a small story the basic spooky mansion style story
"A Group of teenagers are going to a big party but get lost.. it starts raining down
so they decide to seek safety at an old mansion."
Added new minigame "classic" the classic way of ending a deathrun.. get guns and shoot them!
new secret added
changed start screen
added new suprise "MASSIVE ZOMBIE"
*********************************
REMIX 5 UPDATES:
switched around piano tele because looking at the other side it laggs alot less
fixed ladder not working to get out of the vent
deleted 1 of the teles in the cave jumping room to decrease the lagg slightly
afk killer delay changed from 45 secounds to 120 secounds.
changed some lighting schemes abit.
changed pictures at the start
more optimisation done
*********************************
